Entries.movieTheater: Looks like I have competition now.$s#$b#Something new for people to do on a Friday night.#$e#Would be nice to see a movie sometime...$h
Entries.SeedShop_Entry: Whatcha got, Pierre?/Anything particularly nice today?/Where's my grocery list...
Entries.summer_Fri10: Weather like this makes me want to go make some pi√±a coladas...and getting caught in the rain...$h

Entries.Town4: Oh, @! Heard you're having a kid soon. You excited?
Entries.Saloon_Fri: Oh, @! How have you been? Heard on the grapevine you're having a kiddo soon. Here, take this.[236]$h.#$b#I hear parenting takes a lot out of you...

Entries.Sun10: My, it's chilly outside, isn't it @? Have a hot beverage on the house.[253]$h.

Entries.1: I've been living in Pelican Town for...nearly twelve years now?#$b#Boy, it's been a long time...$h
Entries.1_2: There's really nothing like fresh bread in the morning, isn't there?
Entries.2{{YearRemainder}}: There's plenty of dishes I'd love to try on the menu some day, if I ever have the time to develop them properly.
Entries.3{{YearRemainder}}: Try a nice Stardew red with my house spaghetti! There's no better pairing than that.
Entries.5{{YearRemainder}}: Good food, good wine, is there anything better in life?
Entries.6{{YearRemainder}}: I like good, hearty home-style food. Pasta, pizza, things that will fill your heart and soul.
Entries.7{{YearRemainder}}: I've been working on a new pasta recipe, hoping to debut that soon...
Entries.8{{YearRemainder}}: Friend of mine from culinary school is now working at this fancy dinner place in Zuzu city.#$b#Very highly reviewed restaurant.#$e#But personally, @, I prefer a homey place like this.$h
Entries.9{{YearRemainder}}: Some of the best food I've had was from street food vendors in %place.#$b#All you need to cook well is love for the craft.

Entries.SeedShop6: Ah, @, nice seeing you here! Just picking up some fresh produce. Nothing but the best for my family spaghetti recipe!$h
Entries.summerSeedShop6: @, have you cooked anything interesting recently? Our little valley has so many nice ingredients just out for the taking, if you're willing to forage.$h
Entries.fallSeedShop6: Let's see, where did I put my grocery list?
Entries.1_2: I've always dreamed of owning a restaurant.$h
Entries.2_2: Have you ever tried my spaghetti? I'm told it's to die for.$h
Entries.3_2: I spent many years as a line cook at a middling restaurant in Zuzu City. They mostly did pizzas.%revealtasteGus206
Entries.4_2: Bread is a lot of work, but incredibly rewarding!#$b#There's nothing like the smell of freshly baked bread.
Entries.5_2: There's nothing like a nicely aged local wine with a well-cooked meal, eh?
Entries.6_2: The place I used to work for was...pretentious in a way that was pleasant.#$b#I'm glad I'm my own boss now.
Entries.7_2: Some people believe that in order to be a chef, you have to own the best equipment and the best knives.#$b#That's not true. All you really need is to love cooking.$h
Entries.8_2: One of the friends I made back in culinary school opened a new restaurant over in %place. I've been meaning to go there at some point.
Entries.9_2: Emily? She's a great girl, a very hard worker, very very kind. I couldn't have asked for a better waitress.$h
Entries.10_2: Between you and I, there's nothing better than a nice glass of orange juice in the morning.
Entries.11_2: I get up very early in the morning to proof the dough for bread.#$b#But there's nothing better than freshly baked bread, so it's definitely worth it.$h
Entries.12_2: I've been developing a new recipe. Chili with cornbread, something Mayor Lewis might like...
Entries.13_2: Waiting on a new shipment of beer. Been thinking of branching out a bit, serving a few more local brews.#$b#Hey, @, you've got anything?
Entries.14_2: One of the nice things of living so close to the ocean, we get excellent seafood.#$b#My fish tacos are to die for, @. You should try one sometime.
Entries.15_2: I love branching out, cooking things from cultures that aren't my own.
Entries.16_2: If I had more money...I'd love to travel more. See the world a little more, taste all the different dishes people make...
Entries.17_2: I don't believe anyone should ever have to go hungry, @.#$b#Look at all the bounties our world produces, and tell me we can't share that.

Entries.fall_Sun10: Between you and I, @, my least favorite kitchen chore is cleaning the deep fryers.#$b#But it has to be done...#$b#Of course I'm not going to make Emily do a chore I hate.
Entries.14_2: I'm the last surviving restaurant in this here town, and business isn't easy.#$b#Many people cut back on eating out when the economy goes bad.$s
Entries.17_2: I wanted to make my restaurant a place that would feel like home. A place people could gather and relax.#$b#I'm very proud of the place I built.$h
Entries.18_2: When cooking, ingredients matter so, so much. You're not going to make a good dish with bad produce.
Entries.19_2: I'm not going to spread gossip from this bar, @, what kind of bartender do you take me for?
Entries.20_2: I'll make sure Emily is paid before I take money for myself. She's at the start of her life, she could do so much.#$b#Also, I live simply, I don't need much.$h
Entries.22_2: White wine and some escargot, is there anything better?
Entries.23_2: High alcohol wines don't tend to go well with spicy dishes, I always make sure to have something sweet and drinkable on the menu.
Entries.24_2: Brioche doughs are quite difficult to make, but very, very worth your time to do.#$b#A good brioche is rich but so, so light.$h
Entries.25_2: There are some days where I want little more than a nice, fresh salad from all our lovely local ingredients.
Entries.fall_15_2: Hey, @, any fall dishes you're looking forward to cooking?#$e#Made some excellent stuffing the other day. Here, have some![239]
Entries.fall_16_2: Hmmm, this feels like a great time of year for glazed yams...%revealtasteGus208

Entries.fall_Sun10: Between you and I, @, my least favorite kitchen chore is cleaning the deep fryers.#$b#But it has to be done...#$b#Of course I'm not going to make Emily do a chore I hate.
Entries.14_2: Today feels like an excellent day to cook some curry...
